genbankr v1.21.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Retrieve 'other' features

otherFeatures.Rd

Retrieve the other features (not covered by a different accessor) from the set of annotations

otherFeatures(x)

# S4 method for GenBankRecord
otherFeatures(x)

Arguments

x

a GenBankRecord object

Value

A GRanges containing the features which don't fall into another category (ie not gene, exon, transcript, cds, or variant) annotated in the source file

Examples

gb = readGenBank(system.file("sample.gbk", package="genbankr"))

#> Annotations don't have 'locus_tag' label, using 'gene' as gene_id column
#> Annotations don't have 'locus_tag' label, using 'gene' as gene_id column
#> No exons read from genbank file. Assuming sections of CDS are full exons
#> No transcript features (mRNA) found, using spans of CDSs
#> Warning: Got unexpected multi-value field(s) [ rpt_type ]. The resulting column(s) will be of class CharacterList, rather than vector(s). Please contact the maintainer if multi-valuedness is expected/meaningful for the listed field(s).
otherFeatures(gb)

#> GRanges object with 24 ranges and 9 metadata columns:
#>        seqnames        ranges strand |          type                   note
#>           <Rle>     <IRanges>  <Rle> |   <character>            <character>
#>    [1]   VR1814        1-1187      + | repeat_region                    TRL
#>    [2]   VR1814         1-619      + | repeat_region           'a' sequence
#>    [3]   VR1814   1188-194148      + |  misc_feature                     UL
#>    [4]   VR1814     2353-4837      - |         ncRNA                   <NA>
#>    [5]   VR1814     2370-2375      - |    regulatory                   <NA>
#>    ...      ...           ...    ... .           ...                    ...
#>   [20]   VR1814 194716-195335      + | repeat_region           'a' sequence
#>   [21]   VR1814 197248-232701      + |  misc_feature                     US
#>   [22]   VR1814 232702-235233      + | repeat_region                    TRS
#>   [23]   VR1814 234614-235233      + | repeat_region           'a' sequence
#>   [24]   VR1814        235233      + |  misc_feature unpaired T residue a..
#>               rpt_type     loctype ncRNA_class        gene     product
#>        <CharacterList> <character> <character> <character> <character>
#>    [1]        inverted      normal        <NA>        <NA>        <NA>
#>    [2] direct,terminal      normal        <NA>        <NA>        <NA>
#>    [3]                      normal        <NA>        <NA>        <NA>
#>    [4]                      normal       other      RNA2.7      RNA2.7
#>    [5]                      normal        <NA>      RNA2.7        <NA>
#>    ...             ...         ...         ...         ...         ...
#>   [20]        inverted      normal        <NA>        <NA>        <NA>
#>   [21]                      normal        <NA>        <NA>        <NA>
